verbose_text: We then examined for changes in TM4SF5 dependent intracellular signaling in LS174T, HCT-116, and HT-29 cells treated with Ab27 and Ab79 for 72 h. TM4SF5 was previously shown to activate FAK and c-Src and cause the induction and phosphorylation of p27 Kip1 enabling its cytosolic translocation for its role in facilitating EMT and cell migration XREF_BIBR.
evidence: TM4SF5 was previously shown to activate FAK and c-Src and cause the induction and phosphorylation of p27 Kip1
